name: Pepper's Ghost
description:
Happy Halloween! Here's a small proof of concept that I developed over the month.

HOW TO PLAY:

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

K - Throw Cane

J - Posses Power

Escape - Back to Title.

RULES:

Objective: Collect all the keys within the stage.

Use your cane to kill enemies and use Pepper's ghost to posses their powers. Only certain coins and platforms can be used with specific powers. The 4 powers are:

  1. Fire (Red) - Can collect Fire coins and use Red platforms
  2. Water (Blue) -  Can collect Water coins and use Blueplatforms
  3. Electric (Yellow) -  Can collect Electric coins and use Yellow platforms
  4. Air (Green) -  Can collect Air coins and use Green platforms

The ghost's current power is indicated by their color.
